about_the_game:
🧩 Attack on Mosaic City is digital cross-stitch. A meditative game about completing a single enormous grid puzzle that reveals the arrival of Kaiju, Mechs, and much more, and the city's battle for survival against overwhelming odds.

🖼️ Solve regions to gradually uncover stunning pixel art scenes of destruction and heroism while collecting panels of a richly illustrated comic book.

📖 What has brought these terrible forces to bear on the city? As you play, you'll gradually unravel the mystery by piecing together the first issue of "Tales From Mosaic City", revealed panel by panel, region by region. 

💣 If you know how to play Minesweeper, you already know how to play a Mega Mosaic! The numbered clues (0-9) indicate how many light tiles must be placed within 1 square of the clue.

🎶 Whether you're engrossed in your favourite podcasts or listening to your favourite tunes, Attack on Mosaic City serves as the perfect backdrop to enhance your experience. Or choose from the soothing built-in soundtrack to match the meditative gameplay.

⏳ Dozens of Hours of Addictive Gameplay: Lose yourself in hours of calming but challenging puzzle-solving as you uncover a story filled with humor, drama, and action.
